introduction: Calculate how much statutory redundancy pay you can get. This is based on your age, weekly pay and the number of years you’ve been in your job.
more_information:
##Using this service
You’re only legally entitled to redundancy pay if you’ve been in your job for 2 years or more. 

This service doesn’t allow you to enter an age of 81 or above - although you’re still entitled to redundancy pay. In this case, enter your age as 80, along with the correct time you’ve been in your job and weekly pay. This will give you the right amount of redundancy pay.

^Check your employment contract as some employers offer more generous redundancy pay than the legal minimum.^
overview: Calculate how much statutory redundancy pay you can get, based on age, weekly pay, and the number of years you've been at your job
title: Calculate your redundancy pay
